name: Fennel Slaw With Orange, Cumin And Chilies
recipeIngredient: 3 medium-size fennel bulbs, trimmed and julienned, green tops reserved
1 small clove garlic, peeled and minced

recipeInstructions.text: Place the fennel in a large bowl. In a small bowl, combine the fennel seeds, cumin and pepper flakes. Add this to the fennel and toss to coat. Whisk together the orange zest, garlic, lemon juice, orange juice, olive oil, salt and pepper. Pour over the fennel and toss well. Let stand at room temperature for 1 hour. Chop 1/4 cup of the fennel tops and toss them into the salad. Divide among 4 plates and serve.
